surrounding the baby will be 
broken, and the second baby 
should be born very soon 
after	the	first	because	the	
cervix is already fully dilated. If 
contractions	stop	after	the	first	
birth, hormones will be added 
to the drip to restart them.
Triplets or more are almost 
always delivered by elective 
caesarean section.
What your birth partner 
can do
